scripts.gitpod-prepare: npm run git-shh-to-https && sudo apt update && (yes | sudo apt install screen) && (yes | sudo apt install rsync) && (yes | sudo apt install net-tools) && screen -S docker -d -m sudo docker-up
scripts.packages-ci: (cd packages && for d in */; do (cd $d && npm ci); done)
scripts.deepcase-build: cd packages/deepcase && cross-env ASSET_PREFIX='.' npm run build && npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && npx cap copy electron
scripts.local: cross-env npm_config_yes=true NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1 JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_PATH=localhost:3006/gql NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_SSL=0 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 DEEPLINKS_PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3006 DOCKER_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 DEEPLINKS_ROUTE_HANDLERS_HOST=host.docker.internal npm run local-core
scripts.local-core: concurrently "npm run deepcase" "npm run deeplinks" "npm run local-engine" "npm run nextjs"
scripts.electron-dev: (cross-env npm_config_yes=true NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=1 MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_PATH=localhost:3006/gql NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_SSL=0 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 npm run electron-dev-core)
scripts.electron-dev-core: cd packages/deepcase && npx cap copy electron && npm run electron-dev
scripts.electron-build-mac: APPLEIDPASS=$(security find-generic-password -w -a menzorg@gmail.com) APPLEID=menzorg@gmail.com CSC_NAME='ABRAKAR, OOO (8ZG6TUT4AY)' npm run electron-build-unix
scripts.electron-build-unix: npm run use-submodules-instead-of-npm-modules-everywhere && npm run electron-next-build-unix && npm run electron-build-pack
scripts.electron-build-windows: npm run use-submodules-instead-of-npm-modules-everywhere && npm run electron-next-build-windows && npm run electron-build-pack
scripts.electron-build-core: (cross-env npm_config_yes=true NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1 MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_PATH=localhost:3006/gql NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_SSL=0 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 npm run deepcase-build)
scripts.electron-build-pack-demo: cd packages/deepcase/electron && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false npm run electron:pack-demo
scripts.gitpod-init: npm run gitpod-prepare && npm ci && npm run packages && npm run use-deeplinks-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in && npm run apply-hasura
scripts.gitpod-start: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey;  export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 3006) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}')/gql; export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_SSL=1 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); export DEEPLINKS_PUBLIC_URL=$(gp url 3006); export DOCKER_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006; export DEEPLINKS_ROUTE_HANDLERS_HOST=host.docker.internal; npm run gitpod-hasura-reattach; concurrently "npm run deepcase" "npm run deeplinks" "npm run gitpod-engine" "npm run nextjs"
scripts.gitpod-wakeup: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey;  export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 3006) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}')/gql; export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_SSL=1 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); export DEEPLINKS_PUBLIC_URL=$(gp url 3006); export DOCKER_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006; npm run use-deeplinks-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in && concurrently "npm run deepcase" "npm run deeplinks" "(cd packages/deeplinks && npm run start-engine-docker)"
scripts.gitpod-migrate: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey;  export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 3006) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}')/gql; export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_SSL=1 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); export DEEPLINKS_PUBLIC_URL=$(gp url 3006); export DOCKER_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006; cd packages/deeplinks && npm run migrate
scripts.gitpod-unmigrate: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey;  export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 3006) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}')/gql; export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_SSL=1 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); export DEEPLINKS_PUBLIC_URL=$(gp url 3006); export DOCKER_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006; cd packages/deeplinks && npm run unmigrate
scripts.docker-clear: (docker-compose down; docker rm -f $(docker ps -a -q); docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q))
scripts.local-migrate: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}"; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007; export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_PATH=localhost:3006/gql; export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_SSL=0 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006; cd packages/deeplinks && npm run migrate
scripts.local-unmigrate: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007; export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_PATH=localhost:3006/gql; export NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_SSL=0 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006; cd packages/deeplinks && npm run unmigrate
scripts.git-shh-to-https: git config --global url."https://".insteadOf git:// && git config --global url."https://github.com/".insteadOf ssh://git@github.com/
scripts.use-deeplinks-submodule-in-nextjs: cp -r packages/deeplinks/imports packages/nextjs/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && cp -r packages/deeplinks/migrations packages/nextjs/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && cp -r packages/deeplinks/local packages/nextjs/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/local && cp packages/deeplinks/index.* packages/nextjs/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/ && cp packages/deeplinks/package.json packages/nextjs/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/package.json
scripts.use-deeplinks-submodule-in-deepcase: cp -r packages/deeplinks/imports packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && cp -r packages/deeplinks/migrations packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && cp -r packages/deeplinks/local packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/local && cp packages/deeplinks/index.* packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/ && cp packages/deeplinks/package.json packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/package.json
scripts.remove-deeplinks-nodemodule-in-electron: rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/local && rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/index.* && rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/package.json && rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/node_modules
scripts.use-deeplinks-submodule-in-electron: cp -r packages/deeplinks/imports packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && cp -r packages/deeplinks/migrations packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && cp -r packages/deeplinks/local packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/local && cp packages/deeplinks/index.* packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/ && cp packages/deeplinks/package*.json packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks
scripts.use-deeplinks-submodule-in-dev: cp -r packages/deeplinks/imports node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && cp -r packages/deeplinks/migrations node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && cp -r packages/deeplinks/local node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/local && cp packages/deeplinks/index.* node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/ && cp packages/deeplinks/package.json node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/package.json
scripts.use-deeplinks-submodule-instead-of-npm-m: (rm -rf ./packages/deepcase/app && cd packages/deeplinks && npm ci && npm run package:build && cd ../../ && (npm run use-deeplinks-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in-nextjs || true) && (npm run use-deeplinks-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in-deepcase || true) && (npm run use-deeplinks-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in-electron || true) && (npm run use-deeplinks-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in-dev || true) && cd packages/deeplinks && npm run package:unbuild)
scripts.build-hasura: (cd ./packages/hasura && npm ci && npm run package:build && cd ../../)
scripts.unbuild-hasura: (cd ./packages/hasura && npm ci && npm run package:unbuild && cd ../../)
scripts.use-hasura-submodule-instead-of-npm-modu: npm run use-hasura-from-submodules-instead-of-npm-module-in-deepcase && npm run use-hasura-from-submodules-instead-of-npm-module-in-deeplinks && npm run use-hasura-from-submodules-instead-of-npm-module-in-materialized-path && npm run unbuild-hasura
scripts.remove-hasura-nodemodule-everywhere: npm run remove-hasura-nodemodule-in-deeplinks && npm run remove-hasura-nodemodule-in-materialized-path && npm run remove-hasura-nodemodule-in-deepcase
scripts.build-store: (cd ./packages/store && npm ci && npm run package:build && cd ../../)
scripts.unbuild-store: (cd ./packages/store && npm ci && npm run package:unbuild && cd ../..)
scripts.remove-store-nodemodule-everywhere: npm run reemove-store-nodemodule-in-deeplinks && npm run remove-store-nodemodule-in-gh-pages && npm run remove-store-nodemodule-in-js-docker-isolation-provider && npm run remove-store-nodemodule-in-nextjs && npm run remove-store-nodemodule-in-deepcase && npm run remove-store-nodemodule-in-deepcase-electron && npm run remove-store-nodemodule-in-nextjs-electron
scripts.use-store-submodule-instead-of-npm-modul: (npm run use-store-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in-nextjs) && (npm run use-store-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in-deeplinks) && (npm run use-store-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in-hasura) && (npm run use-store-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in-gh-pages) && (npm run use-store-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in-js-docker-isolation-provider) && (npm run use-store-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in-deepcase)
scripts.use-submodules-instead-of-npm-modules-ev: npm run apply-hasura && npm run use-deeplinks-submodule-instead-of-npm-module-in && npm run apply-store
scripts.pull-and-npm-ci-and-use-submodules-inste: git pull --recurse-submodules; (cd packages/hasura; npm ci); (cd packages/deeplinks; npm ci); (cd packages/deepcase; npm ci); (cd packages/deepcase/electron; npm ci); npm run use-submodules-instead-of-npm-modules-everywhere
scripts.local-recreate: npm run local-unmigrate; npm run docker-clear; npm run rm-migrates; npm run local-engine; npm run local-migrate;
scripts.gitpod-recreate: npm run gitpod-unmigrate; npm run docker-clear; npm run rm-migrates; npm run gitpod-engine; npm run gitpod-migrate;
scripts.local-reinit: npm run docker-clear; npm run rm-migrates; npm run local-engine;
scripts.gitpod-reinit: npm run docker-clear; npm run rm-migrates; npm run gitpod-engine;
scripts.gitpod-hasura-reattach: export REATTACH_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export REATTACH_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export REATTACH_HASURA_SSL=1; export REATTACH_DEEPLINKS_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 3006) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); npx gulp gitpod:hasura:reattach
